column8: Makeup artist. Photographer. Iconoclast. Creative visionary François Nars launched NARS Cosmetics with 12 cult-favorite lipsticks in 1994, inspiring self-expression, creativity, and artistry with uncompromising pigment purity and imaginative color. Today, NARS’ boundary-pushing approach manifests from the pigments to the products to the photographed campaigns, shot by François himself—bringing high-fashion, high-style, and forward thinking to beauty. “Play and try to be a little bit daring. Break the rules.” –FRANÇOIS NARSFOUNDER & CREATIVE DIRECTOR OF NARS Cosmetics

column3: Triclone Skin Tech Medium Coverage Foundation with Fermented Arnica
column8:
HAUS LABS BY LADY GAGA: Welcome to the Future of Clean Makeup. Our supercharged, clean artistry makeup is powered by innovation, created for everyone at all application levels, shapes, sizes, colors, ages, and genders. Our makeup is high-tech, high-pigment, and high-performance—presented in an all-new, chic, color-coded, sustainable packaging system. Our inclusive, futuristic formulas are made with patented complexes and proprietary ingredients that deliver skincare benefits. All Haus Labs products are created with kindness—clean, cruelty-free, and vegan. 
 
At Haus, CLEAN goes beyond the 2,600+ ingredients we ban, and rather what’s included. We are committed to cutting-edge, clean ingredient innovations, including our exclusive patent-pending Fermented Arnica, which is 860% times more powerful than conventional arnica. Our name reflects our beliefs: “Haus” represents a creative collective, and “Labs” represents our commitment to biotech. THE FUTURE IS BEAUTIFUL.

- BioFerment 7 Complex™: Proprietary blend of super antioxidants that protect the skin from stress.

Michele Gough-Baril founded Iris&Romeo after two decades in the beauty industry, climbing her way to the top. Burned out by the persistent excess and hustle culture, she stepped away to the healing rhythms of Northern California and gave herself permission to live fully, deeply, and with purpose.

And Iris&Romeo was born. We are the antidote to the beauty hustle culture and the more-is-more mentality.

We make multifunctional, all-in-one, tinted skincare solutions of the highest quality and efficacy. They simplify your morning routine and deliver skin wellness—instantly and over time. This kind of beauty—this undone, well-hydrated look combined with serum strength actives—is the effortless bare-faced beauty we all want. 

Less makeup. More you.

column8:
HAUS LABS BY LADY GAGA: Welcome to the Future of Clean Makeup. Our supercharged, clean artistry makeup is powered by innovation, created for everyone at all application levels, shapes, sizes, colors, ages, and genders. Our makeup is high-tech, high-pigment, and high-performance—presented in an all-new, chic, color-coded, sustainable packaging system. Our inclusive, futuristic formulas are made with patented complexes and proprietary ingredients that deliver skincare benefits. All Haus Labs products are created with kindness—clean, cruelty-free, and vegan. 
 
At Haus, CLEAN goes beyond the 2,600+ ingredients we ban, and rather what’s included. We are committed to cutting-edge, clean ingredient innovations, including our exclusive patent-pending Fermented Arnica, which is 860% times more powerful than conventional arnica. Our name reflects our beliefs: “Haus” represents a creative collective, and “Labs” represents our commitment to biotech. THE FUTURE IS BEAUTIFUL.

column8: Over a decade ago, beauty aficionado Maureen Kelly channeled her entrepreneurial spirit and set out to prove that glamour can be good for you. Launched in the heart of New York City, tarte is a smart, colorful brand offering healthy, eco-chic beauty products that truly work. Tarte’s cruelty-free, high-performance beauty is infused with pure, invigorating ingredients, and all tarte products are formulated without parabens, mineral oil, phthalates, sodium lauryl sulfate, triclosan, and synthetic fragrances. From award-winning blushes and lip tints to the breakthrough Amazonian clay and maracuja complexion products, tarte delivers powerful results for real woman.  Be green, be smart, be tarte.

column8: Entrepreneur and industry icon Anastasia Soare believed that the same balance found in art and nature could also be applied directly to the human face, creating aesthetic harmony. With the idea that brows should be shaped according to an individual’s bone structure, Anastasia developed her line of award-winning brow products and signature Golden Ratio® Eyebrow Shaping Method. Carving out a new category in the industry, this patented three-step technique for crafting personalized brows has become a modern-day beauty essential."One brow does not fit all. This is the entire foundation of Anastasia Beverly Hills. Using the Golden Ratio® Method, the shape of the eyebrow is tailored to each individual’s face and unique bone structure. In just three steps, your personalized brows will outlast any trend."—Anastasia Soare, CEO & Founder

column12: An easy-to-use cream palette with universal and customizable blush and highlighter shades that can be layered for endless glowy and colorful looks.

column3: The Ethereal Baked Face Palette - Long-Wear Bronzer, Highlighter & Blush
column8: ILIA believes in skin that looks like skin–and radiance that comes naturally. With transparency as our guide and color as our vehicle, we challenge the conventions of clean beauty to create something radically new, through safe, potent formulas that make your skin look and feel alive.
column10:
-Edelweiss Extract: Multi-tasking flower extract that hydrates, smooths, and refines skin.
-Winged Kelp Extract: Restores luminosity, helping skin look more youthful.
-Plant-Based Squalane: Seals in moisture and boosts elasticity without clogging pores.

Akoya:
Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Tapioca Starch, Silica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lauroyl Lysine, Tin Oxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Boron Nitride, Xanthan Gum, Leontopodium Alpinum Callus Culture Extract, Alaria Esculenta Extract, Tocopherol, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 77491, Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides).

column12: A limited-edition, all-in-one face palette with weightless, blurring powders to blush, bronze, and highlight.

column3: Sephora Colorful® Powder Luminizer
column8: As Sephora’s own brand, we flex our extensive industry knowledge to create paycheck-friendly products that perform on par with more spendy ones. So whether you’re looking for a ride-or-die eyeliner or a clean skincare routine that doesn’t require a small investment, rest assured: Sephora Collection will wow you and your wallet.
column10: Mica, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), Silica, Glycerin, CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), Polysorbate 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Squalane, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Chondrus Crispus (Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan)), Xanthan Gum, Tin Oxide, Dicalcium Phosphate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tocopherol
column12: An illuminating powder highlighter that instantly lights up the complexion and boosts its natural glow.

column3: Positive Light Silky Touch Highlighter
column8: Created by Selena Gomez, Rare Beauty is challenging unrealistic standards of perfection. In Selena’s own words, “It’s not about being someone else, but being who you are.” This is makeup made to feel good in, without hiding what makes you unique. Airy and breathable, our skin-loving formulas go on easy for adjustable coverage and a fresh finish that always looks like you.
column10: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tapioca Starch, Boron Nitride, Octyldodecanol, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).
column12: An innovative powder highlighter that gives skin an instant glass-like sheen for an easy, natural-looking glow that lasts.

column3: Positive Light Liquid Luminizer Highlight
column8: Created by Selena Gomez, Rare Beauty is challenging unrealistic standards of perfection. In Selena’s own words, “It’s not about being someone else, but being who you are.” This is makeup made to feel good in, without hiding what makes you unique. Airy and breathable, our skin-loving formulas go on easy for adjustable coverage and a fresh finish that always looks like you.
column10: Isododecane, Mica, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera (Sacred Lotus) Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isostearic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tin Oxide, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499)].
column12: A silky, second-skin liquid highlighter that creates a lasting, soft, and luminous finish.

column3: Glowy Super Gel Lightweight Dewy Multipurpose Illuminator
column8: Saie hello to easy, elevated beauty. Super-clean, effortless essentials your skin loves to wear. Founded by former big beauty executive Laney Crowell in 2019, Saie is a totally new kind of makeup where amazing products, sustainable packaging, and inspired design are just as important as clean, good-for-you ingredients. “I love makeup and beauty, and I’m also passionate about feeling good inside and out. When I couldn’t find any clean products that ticked all of the boxes, I decided to bring our big beauty expertise to clean.” —Laney Crowell, Saie founder
column10:
- Plant-Derived Glycerin: Powerful humectant known to increase skin’s natural moisture level.

- Olive-Derived Squalane: Locks in moisture and leaves skin quenched and visibly glowing.

- Rosehip Seed Oil: Ultra-rich in antioxidants to visibly brighten and moisturize skin.


STARGLOW:

Water / Aqua / Eau, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Glycerin, Mica, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 60, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Lactic Acid, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).


SUNGLOW:

Water / Aqua / Eau, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Glycerin, Mica, Sodium Acrylate/sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Isohexadecane, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 80, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Sorbitan Oleate, Lactic Acid, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499).


ROSEGLOW: 

Aqua /Water / Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Glycerin, Mica, Squalane, Carica Papaya Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Phenethyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Lactic Acid.  [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir:  Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxide (Ci 77491)].

The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
column12: A water-based multipurpose illuminator that hydrates and visibly brightens for a fresh, dewy look—use it as glowy prep step, spot highlighter, mix it with skincare or foundation, or can worn on arms and legs for a weightless, body shimmer.

column3: Beauty Highlighter Wand
column8: Founded by British makeup artist Charlotte Tilbury, MBE, in 2013, Charlotte Tilbury Beauty revolutionized the face of the global beauty industry by decoding makeup application for everyone, at every age, with an easy-to-use, easy-to-choose, easy-to-gift range. The company mission is to share the power of makeup, using Charlotte’s award-winning, iconic makeup and research-powered skincare products, to show everyone how easy it is to look and feel like the most beautiful versions of themselves every single day.
column10:
-Soft Focus Silica: Rich velvety texture blurs imperfections.
-Lustrous Polymers: Enhances skin luminosity with a smooth texture.
-Sensorial Oil: Imparts a silky soft feel and shine.

Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydrogenated Didecene, Isododecane, Mica, Glycerin, Propanediol, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Silica, Sodium Chloride, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Lindera Strychnifolia Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491)].
column12: A liquid highlighter wand that illuminates the face.

column3: Cookie and Tickle Shimmer Finish Powder Highlighters
column8: Laughter is the best cosmetic! Benefit Cosmetics is like your super-funny, free-spirited, badass beauty BFF who’s obsessed with brows. From our products to our packaging, we’re all about making beauty fun.

column8: Saie hello to easy, elevated beauty. Super-clean, effortless essentials your skin loves to wear. Founded by former big beauty executive Laney Crowell in 2019, Saie is a totally new kind of makeup where amazing products, sustainable packaging, and inspired design are just as important as clean, good-for-you ingredients. “I love makeup and beauty, and I’m also passionate about feeling good inside and out. When I couldn’t find any clean products that ticked all of the boxes, I decided to bring our big beauty expertise to clean.” —Laney Crowell, Saie founder

column8:
HAUS LABS BY LADY GAGA: Welcome to the Future of Clean Makeup. Our supercharged, clean artistry makeup is powered by innovation, created for everyone at all application levels, shapes, sizes, colors, ages, and genders. Our makeup is high-tech, high-pigment, and high-performance—presented in an all-new, chic, color-coded, sustainable packaging system. Our inclusive, futuristic formulas are made with patented complexes and proprietary ingredients that deliver skincare benefits. All Haus Labs products are created with kindness—clean, cruelty-free, and vegan. 
 
At Haus, CLEAN goes beyond the 2,600+ ingredients we ban, and rather what’s included. We are committed to cutting-edge, clean ingredient innovations, including our exclusive patent-pending Fermented Arnica, which is 860% times more powerful than conventional arnica. Our name reflects our beliefs: “Haus” represents a creative collective, and “Labs” represents our commitment to biotech. THE FUTURE IS BEAUTIFUL.

Carving out a new category in the industry, this patented three-step technique for crafting personalized brows has become a modern-day beauty essential."One brow does not fit all. This is the entire foundation of Anastasia Beverly Hills. Using the Golden Ratio® Method, the shape of the eyebrow is tailored to each individual’s face and unique bone structure. column8: Makeup artist. Photographer. Iconoclast. Creative visionary François Nars launched NARS Cosmetics with 12 cult-favorite lipsticks in 1994, inspiring self-expression, creativity, and artistry with uncompromising pigment purity and imaginative color. Today, NARS’ boundary-pushing approach manifests from the pigments to the products to the photographed campaigns, shot by François himself—bringing high-fashion, high-style, and forward thinking to beauty. “Play and try to be a little bit daring. Break the rules.” –FRANÇOIS NARSFOUNDER & CREATIVE DIRECTOR OF NARS Cosmetics

As one of the world’s most sought-after editorial makeup artists, Gucci Westman’s “second skin” approach is the secret behind Westman Atelier. The clean luxury cosmetics line merges innovative high-performance pigments, nourishing skincare ingredients, and the safest formulations with an extraordinary eye for color. The result is a seamlessly edited product range for dewy, radiant, and healthy-looking skin that’s always effortless, never overdone. As a mother, makeup artist, and champion of holistic living, Gucci believes passionately that luxury, efficacy, and clean don’t have to be a contradiction when it comes to exceptional makeup. So you can feel good about your skin from the inside out.

column8:
HAUS LABS BY LADY GAGA: Welcome to the Future of Clean Makeup. Our supercharged, clean artistry makeup is powered by innovation, created for everyone at all application levels, shapes, sizes, colors, ages, and genders. Our makeup is high-tech, high-pigment, and high-performance—presented in an all-new, chic, color-coded, sustainable packaging system. Our inclusive, futuristic formulas are made with patented complexes and proprietary ingredients that deliver skincare benefits. All Haus Labs products are created with kindness—clean, cruelty-free, and vegan. 
 
At Haus, CLEAN goes beyond the 2,600+ ingredients we ban, and rather what’s included. We are committed to cutting-edge, clean ingredient innovations, including our exclusive patent-pending Fermented Arnica, which is 860% times more powerful than conventional arnica. Our name reflects our beliefs: “Haus” represents a creative collective, and “Labs” represents our commitment to biotech. THE FUTURE IS BEAUTIFUL.

column8:
Mango People is a plant-powered, Ayurvedic-inspired, eco-conscious beauty brand. Simply put, we make makeup that’s good for your skin and the planet. Our products are formulated with fruit extracts and adaptogenic herbs from Ayurveda and infused with rich pigments that look and—most importantly—feel incredible on the skin.

“Mango People was born out of my struggle for not being able to find a nude pink lipstick that actually showed up on my pigmented lips and with ingredients that are actually good for my skin. 

“I wanted to create a line of products where anyone, no matter the skin tone, can find the perfect shade that accentuates their natural beauty, without compromising on performance, ingredients, or our planet.”        

 — Sravya Adusumilli, Mango People founder

column8: Over a decade ago, beauty aficionado Maureen Kelly channeled her entrepreneurial spirit and set out to prove that glamour can be good for you. Launched in the heart of New York City, tarte is a smart, colorful brand offering healthy, eco-chic beauty products that truly work. Tarte’s cruelty-free, high-performance beauty is infused with pure, invigorating ingredients, and all tarte products are formulated without parabens, mineral oil, phthalates, sodium lauryl sulfate, triclosan, and synthetic fragrances. From award-winning blushes and lip tints to the breakthrough Amazonian clay and maracuja complexion products, tarte delivers powerful results for real woman.  Be green, be smart, be tarte.

column8:
HAUS LABS BY LADY GAGA: Welcome to the Future of Clean Makeup. Our supercharged, clean artistry makeup is powered by innovation, created for everyone at all application levels, shapes, sizes, colors, ages, and genders. Our makeup is high-tech, high-pigment, and high-performance—presented in an all-new, chic, color-coded, sustainable packaging system. Our inclusive, futuristic formulas are made with patented complexes and proprietary ingredients that deliver skincare benefits. All Haus Labs products are created with kindness—clean, cruelty-free, and vegan. 
 
At Haus, CLEAN goes beyond the 2,600+ ingredients we ban, and rather what’s included. We are committed to cutting-edge, clean ingredient innovations, including our exclusive patent-pending Fermented Arnica, which is 860% times more powerful than conventional arnica. Our name reflects our beliefs: “Haus” represents a creative collective, and “Labs” represents our commitment to biotech. THE FUTURE IS BEAUTIFUL.

column8: Saie hello to easy, elevated beauty. Super-clean, effortless essentials your skin loves to wear. Founded by former big beauty executive Laney Crowell in 2019, Saie is a totally new kind of makeup where amazing products, sustainable packaging, and inspired design are just as important as clean, good-for-you ingredients. “I love makeup and beauty, and I’m also passionate about feeling good inside and out. When I couldn’t find any clean products that ticked all of the boxes, I decided to bring our big beauty expertise to clean.” —Laney Crowell, Saie founder

column8: Makeup artist. Photographer. Iconoclast. Creative visionary François Nars launched NARS Cosmetics with 12 cult-favorite lipsticks in 1994, inspiring self-expression, creativity, and artistry with uncompromising pigment purity and imaginative color. Today, NARS’ boundary-pushing approach manifests from the pigments to the products to the photographed campaigns, shot by François himself—bringing high-fashion, high-style, and forward thinking to beauty. “Play and try to be a little bit daring. Break the rules.” –FRANÇOIS NARSFOUNDER & CREATIVE DIRECTOR OF NARS Cosmetics

column3: D-Bronzi™ Bronzing Drops with Peptides
column8: Since 2012, Drunk Elephant has pioneered a skin- and hair-care philosophy that is as radical as it is simple. Get rid of anything that is irritating, sensitizing, disruptive, or inflammatory, and replace it with smart, biocompatible ingredients the skin recognizes and embraces. We call the culprits the Suspicious 6—essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS—and you will never find any of them in our line. Instead, we formulate our products with powerful, safe, biocompatible ingredients that bring skin and scalp back to their healthiest, most balanced, most radiant state. That’s our ingredient-elimination philosophy for a total skin reset.

column8: It’s time for beauty solutions that really work. After working in the beauty industry for over 25 years, Alicia Grande stumbled upon a doctor and scientist with a formula that gave her longer and thicker-looking lashes. Seeing the amazing results for herself, she knew she had to give every woman the confidence of beautiful lashes; thus GrandeLASH-MD lash-enhancing serum was born. Her mission has now expanded to not only giving everyone bigger and better lashes, but also bolder lips, brows, and hair. Today, Grande Cosmetics’ company vision has grown to incorporate the belief that results-driven products don’t have to feel boring or medical, and it’s become the company mission to glam these products up! They work to create functional makeup hybrids that are a cross between cosmetic and clinical to enhance your own natural beauty and make your features pop.

column8: Over a decade ago, beauty aficionado Maureen Kelly channeled her entrepreneurial spirit and set out to prove that glamour can be good for you. column8:
Smarter Skincare. Inspired by biomedical innovation. Backed by 30{+} years of research and science. Driven by results.

Augustinus Bader is a premium, science-led skincare brand created by Professor Augustinus Bader - a globally recognized biomedical scientist and physician, and one of the foremost experts in stem cell biology and regenerative medicine.

Inspired by the results of 30+ years of research and application in the biomedical field, Professor Bader created a lineup of skincare products that leverage a patented cellular-renewing technology - TFC8 - that addresses and improves overall skin health.

column3: Volumizing Tinted Brow Gel
column8: Entrepreneur and industry icon Anastasia Soare believed that the same balance found in art and nature could also be applied directly to the human face, creating aesthetic harmony. With the idea that brows should be shaped according to an individual’s bone structure, Anastasia developed her line of award-winning brow products and signature Golden Ratio® Eyebrow Shaping Method. Carving out a new category in the industry, this patented three-step technique for crafting personalized brows has become a modern-day beauty essential."One brow does not fit all. This is the entire foundation of Anastasia Beverly Hills. Using the Golden Ratio® Method, the shape of the eyebrow is tailored to each individual’s face and unique bone structure. In just three steps, your personalized brows will outlast any trend."—Anastasia Soare, CEO & Founder

column8: It’s time for beauty solutions that really work. After working in the beauty industry for over 25 years, Alicia Grande stumbled upon a doctor and scientist with a formula that gave her longer and thicker-looking lashes. Seeing the amazing results for herself, she knew she had to give every woman the confidence of beautiful lashes; thus GrandeLASH-MD lash-enhancing serum was born. Her mission has now expanded to not only giving everyone bigger and better lashes, but also bolder lips, brows, and hair. Today, Grande Cosmetics’ company vision has grown to incorporate the belief that results-driven products don’t have to feel boring or medical, and it’s become the company mission to glam these products up! They work to create functional makeup hybrids that are a cross between cosmetic and clinical to enhance your own natural beauty and make your features pop.

After working in the beauty industry for over 25 years, Alicia Grande stumbled upon a doctor and scientist with a formula that gave her longer and thicker-looking lashes. Seeing the amazing results for herself, she knew she had to give every woman the confidence of beautiful lashes; thus GrandeLASH-MD lash-enhancing serum was born. Her mission has now expanded to not only giving everyone bigger and better lashes, but also bolder lips, brows, and hair. Today, Grande Cosmetics’ company vision has grown to incorporate the belief that results-driven products don’t have to feel boring or medical, and it’s become the company mission to glam these products up! They work to create functional makeup hybrids that are a cross between cosmetic and clinical to enhance your own natural beauty and make your features pop.

column8: Entrepreneur and industry icon Anastasia Soare believed that the same balance found in art and nature could also be applied directly to the human face, creating aesthetic harmony. With the idea that brows should be shaped according to an individual’s bone structure, Anastasia developed her line of award-winning brow products and signature Golden Ratio® Eyebrow Shaping Method. Carving out a new category in the industry, this patented three-step technique for crafting personalized brows has become a modern-day beauty essential."One brow does not fit all. This is the entire foundation of Anastasia Beverly Hills. Using the Golden Ratio® Method, the shape of the eyebrow is tailored to each individual’s face and unique bone structure. In just three steps, your personalized brows will outlast any trend."—Anastasia Soare, CEO & Founder

column8:
A new standard of luxury in clean beauty.

As one of the world’s most sought-after editorial makeup artists, Gucci Westman’s “second skin” approach is the secret behind Westman Atelier. The clean luxury cosmetics line merges innovative high-performance pigments, nourishing skincare ingredients, and the safest formulations with an extraordinary eye for color. The result is a seamlessly edited product range for dewy, radiant, and healthy-looking skin that’s always effortless, never overdone. As a mother, makeup artist, and champion of holistic living, Gucci believes passionately that luxury, efficacy, and clean don’t have to be a contradiction when it comes to exceptional makeup. So you can feel good about your skin from the inside out.
column10:

column8: Entrepreneur and industry icon Anastasia Soare believed that the same balance found in art and nature could also be applied directly to the human face, creating aesthetic harmony. With the idea that brows should be shaped according to an individual’s bone structure, Anastasia developed her line of award-winning brow products and signature Golden Ratio® Eyebrow Shaping Method. Carving out a new category in the industry, this patented three-step technique for crafting personalized brows has become a modern-day beauty essential."One brow does not fit all. This is the entire foundation of Anastasia Beverly Hills. Using the Golden Ratio® Method, the shape of the eyebrow is tailored to each individual’s face and unique bone structure. In just three steps, your personalized brows will outlast any trend."—Anastasia Soare, CEO & Founder

HAUS LABS BY LADY GAGA: Welcome to the Future of Clean Makeup. Our supercharged, clean artistry makeup is powered by innovation, created for everyone at all application levels, shapes, sizes, colors, ages, and genders. Our makeup is high-tech, high-pigment, and high-performance—presented in an all-new, chic, color-coded, sustainable packaging system. Our inclusive, futuristic formulas are made with patented complexes and proprietary ingredients that deliver skincare benefits. All Haus Labs products are created with kindness—clean, cruelty-free, and vegan. 
 
At Haus, CLEAN goes beyond the 2,600+ ingredients we ban, and rather what’s included. We are committed to cutting-edge, clean ingredient innovations, including our exclusive patent-pending Fermented Arnica, which is 860% times more powerful than conventional arnica. Our name reflects our beliefs: “Haus” represents a creative collective, and “Labs” represents our commitment to biotech. THE FUTURE IS BEAUTIFUL.

column3: Lala Retro™ Nourishing Whipped Refillable Moisturizer
column8: Since 2012, Drunk Elephant has pioneered a skin- and hair-care philosophy that is as radical as it is simple. Get rid of anything that is irritating, sensitizing, disruptive, or inflammatory, and replace it with smart, biocompatible ingredients the skin recognizes and embraces. We call the culprits the Suspicious 6—essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS—and you will never find any of them in our line. Instead, we formulate our products with powerful, safe, biocompatible ingredients that bring skin and scalp back to their healthiest, most balanced, most radiant state. That’s our ingredient-elimination philosophy for a total skin reset.
column10:
-African-Oil Blend: Nourishes, visibly rejuvenates, and moisturizes.
-Ceramides AP, EOP, and NP: These plant-derived ceramides are identical to the wax-like moisturizing ceramides that occur naturally in skin. In Lala Retro™, they help soothe and maintain the moisture balance of skin while protecting against water loss.
-Phytosphingosine: This plant-derived lipid has powerful soothing and restorative benefits.

column3: Protini™ Polypeptide Firming Refillable Moisturizer
column8: Since 2012, Drunk Elephant has pioneered a skin- and hair-care philosophy that is as radical as it is simple. Get rid of anything that is irritating, sensitizing, disruptive, or inflammatory, and replace it with smart, biocompatible ingredients the skin recognizes and embraces. We call the culprits the Suspicious 6—essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS—and you will never find any of them in our line. Instead, we formulate our products with powerful, safe, biocompatible ingredients that bring skin and scalp back to their healthiest, most balanced, most radiant state. That’s our ingredient-elimination philosophy for a total skin reset.
column10:

-Soybean Folic Acid Ferment Extract: This B vitamin plays a central role in maintaining youthful-, elastic-looking skin. Skin is thirsty for folic acid, especially after exposure to sun.

column8:
ALPYN is the first and only skincare brand to sustainably harvest wild plants from the mountains of Jackson Hole, Wyoming, and infuse them into their formulas. These highly resilient and wildly efficacious plants are conditioned to survive in the most extreme climate. When applied to skin, they behave just like they do in the wild: nourishing, protecting, and deeply hydrating skin.

Alpyn Beauty is committed to sustainability through partnerships like 1% for the Planet, where a portion of every purchase goes directly to forest restoration efforts. To date, over 900 acres of wildlife-dependent grasslands have been restored.

column8:
Michele Gough-Baril founded Iris&Romeo after two decades in the beauty industry, climbing her way to the top. Burned out by the persistent excess and hustle culture, she stepped away to the healing rhythms of Northern California and gave herself permission to live fully, deeply, and with purpose.

And Iris&Romeo was born. We are the antidote to the beauty hustle culture and the more-is-more mentality.

We make multifunctional, all-in-one, tinted skincare solutions of the highest quality and efficacy. They simplify your morning routine and deliver skin wellness—instantly and over time. This kind of beauty—this undone, well-hydrated look combined with serum strength actives—is the effortless bare-faced beauty we all want. 

Less makeup. More you.

Get rid of anything that is irritating, sensitizing, disruptive, or inflammatory, and replace it with smart, biocompatible ingredients the skin recognizes and embraces. We call the culprits the Suspicious 6—essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS—and you will never find any of them in our line. Instead, we formulate our products with powerful, safe, biocompatible ingredients that bring skin and scalp back to their healthiest, most balanced, most radiant state. That’s our ingredient-elimination philosophy for a total skin reset.

column3: The Original MakeUp Eraser® Makeup Remover Cloth
column8: Elexsis McCarthy, founder of The Original MakeUp Eraser, launched the brand in 2013 after discovering a way to remove all her makeup with no chemicals, no oils, JUST water.“One day it finally hit me, I had not used or purchased a single makeup wipe or removal product in over 10 years! I knew this was something I needed to share with the world.”Having an entrepreneurial mindset and a passion for sustainability, Elexsis began to formulate a better, softer and plusher material than the one she had been using. The result was a perfect blend of a premium, antibacterial polyester that contains millions of tiny hair-like fibers that work as a suction cup to pull all makeup up and out of the skin. Seven years later the brand remains family oriented, selling in some of the largest retailers in the world.

column3: E-Rase™ Milki Micellar Water
column8: Since 2012, Drunk Elephant has pioneered a skin- and hair-care philosophy that is as radical as it is simple. Get rid of anything that is irritating, sensitizing, disruptive, or inflammatory, and replace it with smart, biocompatible ingredients the skin recognizes and embraces. We call the culprits the Suspicious 6—essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS—and you will never find any of them in our line. Instead, we formulate our products with powerful, safe, biocompatible ingredients that bring skin and scalp back to their healthiest, most balanced, most radiant state. That’s our ingredient-elimination philosophy for a total skin reset.
column10:
-Micellar Cleansing Blend: A mix of ultra-gentle, dirt- and pollution-capturing surfactants and emollients.
-3-Ceramide Blend: Ceramides AP, NP, and EOP are derived from plant sources and are identical to the wax-like moisturizing ceramides that occur naturally in skin and helpsoothe and maintain the moisture balance of skin while protecting against water loss. Ceramides help fill in the spaces between skin cells, giving them the appearance of elasticity and playing a critical role in supporting the skin barrier.
-Wild Melon Seed Oil: Cold pressed and rich in omega 6 and 9 fatty acids (linoleic and oleic) as well as antioxidant polyphenols, it’s used for its soothing, moisturizing, and barrier-supportive benefits.

We call the culprits the Suspicious 6—essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS—and you will never find any of them in our line. Instead, we formulate our products with powerful, safe, biocompatible ingredients that bring skin and scalp back to their healthiest, most balanced, most radiant state. HAUS LABS BY LADY GAGA: Welcome to the Future of Clean Makeup. Our supercharged, clean artistry makeup is powered by innovation, created for everyone at all application levels, shapes, sizes, colors, ages, and genders. Our makeup is high-tech, high-pigment, and high-performance—presented in an all-new, chic, color-coded, sustainable packaging system. Our inclusive, futuristic formulas are made with patented complexes and proprietary ingredients that deliver skincare benefits. All Haus Labs products are created with kindness—clean, cruelty-free, and vegan. 
 
At Haus, CLEAN goes beyond the 2,600+ ingredients we ban, and rather what’s included. We are committed to cutting-edge, clean ingredient innovations, including our exclusive patent-pending Fermented Arnica, which is 860% times more powerful than conventional arnica. Our name reflects our beliefs: “Haus” represents a creative collective, and “Labs” represents our commitment to biotech. THE FUTURE IS BEAUTIFUL.

column8: It’s time for beauty solutions that really work. After working in the beauty industry for over 25 years, Alicia Grande stumbled upon a doctor and scientist with a formula that gave her longer and thicker-looking lashes. Seeing the amazing results for herself, she knew she had to give every woman the confidence of beautiful lashes; thus GrandeLASH-MD lash-enhancing serum was born. Her mission has now expanded to not only giving everyone bigger and better lashes, but also bolder lips, brows, and hair. Today, Grande Cosmetics’ company vision has grown to incorporate the belief that results-driven products don’t have to feel boring or medical, and it’s become the company mission to glam these products up! They work to create functional makeup hybrids that are a cross between cosmetic and clinical to enhance your own natural beauty and make your features pop.

column8: Jeju Island, Korea, is the birthplace of innisfree’s potent and responsibly sourced natural ingredients.Thanks to its unique ecosystem, this volcanic oasis provides the perfect environment for skin-loving ingredients to flourish. Green tea, grown on innisfree’s USDA organic farm, is harvested solely for its skincare benefits. The proprietary extraction process brings Jeju green tea’s unique hydrating properties from the brand’s farm to your face. Inspired by their preservation efforts on Jeju, innisfree promotes eco-friendly practices to live a greener life.

column3: Pore Minimizing Instant Detox Mask
column8: Born in Bordeaux, powered by antioxidant-rich grapes, Caudalie is committed to creating the most effective, clean, natural, and sustainable skincare. The brand uses upcycled vine ingredients and partners with Dr. David Sinclair to develop exclusive patents and highly effective formulas that are safe for the skin and the environment. Caudalie’s packaging is recycled, recyclable, or refillable, using the least amount of plastic. The brand created 100% Plastic Collect, an eco-initiative to remove, recycle, and repurpose plastic waste. Caudalie has been the number-one beauty contributor to 1% for the Planet since 2012 and will have planted 13M trees worldwide by 2025.
column10:

column8: SK-II began at a sake brewery in Japan. Since then, SK-II with Pitera™ has become a skin secret shared by actress Cate Blanchett and women around the world—it transforms the complexion’s texture, radiance, firmness, spot control, and wrinkle resilience. A leading skincare brand for more than 30 years, SK-II continues to deliver crystal clear skin through well-loved products including the Facial Treatment Essence, Essential Power Cream, and the Cellumination Essence.

column8:
ALPYN is the first and only skincare brand to sustainably harvest wild plants from the mountains of Jackson Hole, Wyoming, and infuse them into their formulas. These highly resilient and wildly efficacious plants are conditioned to survive in the most extreme climate. When applied to skin, they behave just like they do in the wild: nourishing, protecting, and deeply hydrating skin.

Alpyn Beauty is committed to sustainability through partnerships like 1% for the Planet, where a portion of every purchase goes directly to forest restoration efforts. To date, over 900 acres of wildlife-dependent grasslands have been restored.

The brand uses upcycled vine ingredients and partners with Dr. David Sinclair to develop exclusive patents and highly effective formulas that are safe for the skin and the environment. Caudalie’s packaging is recycled, recyclable, or refillable, using the least amount of plastic. The brand created 100% Plastic Collect, an eco-initiative to remove, recycle, and repurpose plastic waste. Caudalie has been the number-one beauty contributor to 1% for the Planet since 2012 and will have planted 13M trees worldwide by 2025.

column8: Dermalogica is a professional-grade skin care brand founded by a skin therapist, so we know how to create skin care solutions that work. Our mission has always been the same: develop innovative products and services that actively improve skin health. Based in Los Angeles, our products are made in the USA and sold in more than 80 countries worldwide. We are cruelty free, certified vegan and our formulas have been clean since 1986. As of 2020, all paper and cartons we use are FSC certified to be sustainable for forests.

-Superfood Algae Extract: Restores moisture balance for a youthful complexion.

column8: Tatcha is a celebration of classical Japanese beauty culture from Kyoto to San Francisco. In 2008, Vicky Tsai encountered centuries-old beauty rituals in Kyoto and a philosophy of care and harmony that forever altered her life. Founded the following year, Tatcha remasters timeless Japanese beauty preparations into clean, luxurious rituals of self-care that invite you into the moment and back to yourself. Every Tatcha purchase also contributes towards a beautiful future by supporting equal access to education for underserved children around the world.

column8: Tatcha is a celebration of classical Japanese beauty culture from Kyoto to San Francisco. Founded the following year, Tatcha remasters timeless Japanese beauty preparations into clean, luxurious rituals of self-care that invite you into the moment and back to yourself. Every Tatcha purchase also contributes towards a beautiful future by supporting equal access to education for underserved children around the world.

column8: Since 2012, Drunk Elephant has pioneered a skin- and hair-care philosophy that is as radical as it is simple. Get rid of anything that is irritating, sensitizing, disruptive, or inflammatory, and replace it with smart, biocompatible ingredients the skin recognizes and embraces. We call the culprits the Suspicious 6—essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS—and you will never find any of them in our line. Instead, we formulate our products with powerful, safe, biocompatible ingredients that bring skin and scalp back to their healthiest, most balanced, most radiant state. That’s our ingredient-elimination philosophy for a total skin reset.
column10:
-Four-Electrolyte Blend: With antioxidant-rich and powerful humectant ingredients (coconut water, sodium PCA, magnesium PCA, and prickly pear extract), electrolytes are vital to helping maintain hydration levels in skin, supporting barrier strength and lipid content, calming redness, and protecting against environmental dehydration.

-Vitamin F: Soothing fatty acids (linolenic and linoleic) play a vital role in maintaining hydration levels and improving skin texture and suppleness while reducing visible irritation and supporting acid-mantle strength.

-Niacinamide: Also known as vitamin B3, niacinamide has a wide range of benefits, most notably its ability to improve visible signs of aging including fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of firmness as well as uneven tone and texture.

column8: Biossance is paving the path for clean beauty for all. We formulate effective, clean and sustainable skincare products in our in-house lab and are setting the standard for the entire beauty industry. Currently, the United States bans only 12 ingredients for cosmetic use—we believe that’s not nearly enough. Biossance bans more than 2,000 potentially toxic or irritating ingredients from our formulas. Our products are also cruelty-free, vegan and EWG-verified. We make our hero ingredient, squalane, from renewable sugarcane. It’s nature’s best moisturizer for you and the planet—and helps save 2 million sharks every year.

column8: At Jack Black, we’re a small team with a big entrepreneurial spirit. When we started this journey nearly 19 years ago, we knew one thing for certain: There were plenty of skincare companies that made luxury, efficacious products for women, but no one was addressing the needs of the modern man. So we stayed close to our customers (we still do) and listened to what they wanted—and what they didn’t. What they wanted were no-nonsense products that worked as advertised and used the best ingredients—and were never, ever tested on animals.Nothing complicated. Nothing cosmetic. Just superior skincare. Welcome to the number one bestselling men’s skincare brand.**Source: The NPD Group, Inc./ U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Measured Market, Skincare Sales, January 2018–December 2018

column3: Lippe Balm
column8: Since 2012, Drunk Elephant has pioneered a skin- and hair-care philosophy that is as radical as it is simple. Get rid of anything that is irritating, sensitizing, disruptive, or inflammatory, and replace it with smart, biocompatible ingredients the skin recognizes and embraces. We call the culprits the Suspicious 6—essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/dyes, and SLS—and you will never find any of them in our line. Instead, we formulate our products with powerful, safe, biocompatible ingredients that bring skin and scalp back to their healthiest, most balanced, most radiant state. That’s our ingredient-elimination philosophy for a total skin reset.

column3: Daily Defense Mineral Body Lotion SPF 30
column8: Soleil Toujours is a reef-safe, luxury sun care brand erasing the divide between clean, efficacious skincare and innovative, eco-friendly UV filters to create SPF Powered Skincare. Our EcoSun Complex packs our no-white-cast formulas with nourishing antioxidants to hydrate and protect skin. Soleil Toujours formulas are always luxurious, never harmful, and meet the strictest reef safety standards. A portion of our proceeds supports coral reef restoration in Jamaica, where we’ve helped plant over 50,000 corals.
column10:
-Vitamin C: Visibly brightens and firms skin and reduces the appearance of fine lines.
-Squalane: Retains moisture, intensely hydrates, and replenishes the skin barrier.
-Niacinamide: Promotes a smooth and supple skin surface and visibly evens skin tone.

column3: Isle Body Oil Sunscreen SPF 30 with Sea Moss and Squalane
column8: Founded by supermodel and activist Winnie Harlow, CAY SKIN is giving sunscreen a makeover with a collection that looks and feels good on everyone—no matter their skin tone or type. Developed for everyone under the sun, CAY SKIN is daily sun care infused with gentle, island-based ingredients and high-performance skincare actives that are lightweight, breathable, and give you confidence to show more skin every day. Safe for your skin and kind to the environment, CAY SKIN products are vegan, cruelty-free, non-comedogenic, and dermatologist tested.

-Sea Moss: A nutrient-rich seaweed that hydrates, strengthens, and protects.

column3: The Invisible One SPF 50 Hydrating Face Sunscreen + Primer with Hyaluronic Acid
column8: Born in Britain in 2021, Hello Sunday is breaking the rules of SPF with multitasking daily skincare essentials, powered by broad-spectrum SPF 45+. It’s goodbye traditional sunscreen struggles and hello to weightless, feel-good skincare formulas that blend easily, while also protecting against early signs of ageing. There’s something for everyone, every day, making it easy to fit SPF into daily routines, no matter the weather or season, 365 days a year.
